entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump Why do you encourage protestor to defy shelter in place rules when doing so means potentially sending them to death? This isn’t about Liberty, it’s about a Pandemic that kills! Why give medical advice when you’re not a doctor. Why didn’t you act in NoV/Dec on Covid-19 when u knew
